explains: v. 建议；推荐；（使）联想到；暗示；唤起（suggest 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.en: I tactfully suggested he should see a doctor.
sentences.cn: 我婉转地建议他去看医生。

sentences.en: He should have paid. He suggested it, after all.
sentences.cn: 他本来就应该付款。反正他自己也这么提出。

sentences.en: She helpfully suggested that I try the local library.
sentences.cn: 她很热心地建议我试试本地的图书馆。
